perk.name: perkMasteringResources
perk.desc_key: Learning this perk allows you to transform coins into resources

effect_description.long_desc_key: Allows you to transform 2000 coins into 1000 scrap iron or wood.
Allows you to transform 2000 coins into 1000 scrap lead. Transform faster 5%.
Allows you to transform 2000 coins into 1000 nitrate powder or 1000 coal.
Allows you to transform 2000 coins into 500 scrap polymer. Transform faster 15%.
Allows you to transform 2000 coins into 500 scrap brass or 500 Oil Shale. Transform faster 30%.

perk.name: perkMechanicalOperations
perk.desc_key: Learning this perk allows you to craft mechanical stuff.

effect_description.long_desc_key: Allows you to craft Spring.
Allows you to craft Mechanical Parts. Crafting Mechanical Operations items faster 15%.
Allows you to craft Electronic Parts.
Allows you to craft Small Engine. Crafting Mechanical Operations items faster 30%.
Allows you to craft Ore Miner. Crafting Mechanical Operations items faster 50%.
